name: generate_blog_image
description: Generate an image for use in the blog post. Use this for hero images, concept illustrations, or section visuals. You can call this multiple times for different sections (recommended: 2-4 images per post).

section_heading.description: The section heading this image relates to (from your outline)

image_prompt.description: Detailed image generation prompt describing the visual style, subject, composition, and mood. Be specific and descriptive for best results.

alt_text.description: Accessibility-friendly alt text describing the image for screen readers

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the image. 16:9 for hero images, 4:3 for inline content images, 1:1 for square visuals, 21:9 for ultra-wide banners
